data.description: This is the length of filament over which the maximum retraction count is enforced. This value protects the number of retractions on the same piece of filament.
data.img_description: This image illustrates a cross section of the feeder, with the 'Minimum extrusion distance window' indicated.
data.hints: - Example: If you set the maximum retraction count to 25 and the minimum extrusion distance window to 1.0 mm, it will do a maximum of 25 retractions per 1.0 mm extruded filament.
